data.eml:eml: Probathylepadidae, a new family of Scalpelliformes (Thoracica: Cirripedia: Crustacea), for Probathylepas faxian gen. nov., sp. nov., from a hydrothermal vent in the Okinawa Trough

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ren, Xian-Qiu, Sha, Zhong-Li (2015): Probathylepadidae, a new family of Scalpelliformes (Thoracica: Cirripedia: Crustacea), for Probathylepas faxian gen. nov., sp. nov., from a hydrothermal vent in the Okinawa Trough. Zootaxa 4033 (1): 144-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.1.9
